name: yet-another-discord-presence
description: Yet another Discord Rich Presence will show information on your current activity in Visual Studio Code
author: Satoqz

rpc.clientID.description: Discord Rich Prensence Client ID. Change only if you know exactly what youre doing

rpc.showStatusBar.description: Whether or not to show a little icon at the bottom left that indicates the connection to the Discord Client

rpc.showIdle.description: Whether or not to show an indicator icon whether you're idle or busy in VSCode

rpc.checkIdleInterval.description: How often to check (in seconds) if your VSCode window is focused. Only relevant if `showIdle` is set to true

rpc.showDebugging.description: Whether or not to show when you're debugging

rpc.showFile.description: Whether or not to show the name of the file you're working on

rpc.showWorkspace.description: Whether or not to show the name of your workspace

rpc.showTime.description: Whether or not to show the elapsed time

rpc.hideFiles.description: Array of regular expressions to match file names that should not be shown

rpc.hideWorkspaces.description: Array of regular expressions to match workspace names that should not be shown

rpc.ignoreWorkspaces.description: Array of regular expressions to match workspace names that should prevent the extension from starting

rpc.showProblems.description: Whether or not to show the count of problems (warnings, errors) present in your workspace

rpc.editingText.description: Syntax of the text displayed when you are editing a file. {file} will be replaced by the according file name

rpc.viewingText.description: Syntax of the text displayed when you are viewing a file. {file} will be replaced by the according file name

rpc.debuggingText.description: Syntax of the text displayed when you are debugging. {file} will be replaced by the name of the opened file

rpc.workspaceText.description: Syntax of the text displaying your workspace name. {workspace} will be replaced by the name of your workspace

rpc.problemsText.description: Syntax of the text displaying the amount of problems in your workspace. {count} will be replaced by the respective amount of problems

rpc.noFileOpenedText.description: The text that will be displayed when you closed all editors / files
